com.wiseapps.davacon.core.se
Class SDCardUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.wiseapps.davacon.core.se.SDCardUtils

public class SDCardUtils
extends java.lang.Object

The class provides static methods to handle read from/write to sd card operations.
